Thunderwarn is a weather app that try to avoid that you get wet for being surprised by rain. You will be notified each time that the forecast for the following day includes rain.

We live in a world of perceptions, everything is relative, so we use the apparent temperature also known as \'fells like\' as the default temperature values that are shown in this app. This calculated value takes in consideration the thermometer temperature, humidity and wind speed
